sections.heading: railway systems; powers of city
sections.text: A city of the primary class may authorize or permit the use of its roads, streets, highways, alleys, or other public rights-of-way for street railway systems.SourceLaws 1901, c. 16, § 106, p. 111;R.S.1913, § 4539;C.S.1922, § 3925;C.S.1929, § 15-718;R.S.1943, § 15-729;
